Module c195.c195

Package Controllers

package Controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    AddAppointmentController is the controller responsible for the add appointment page.
    AddCustomerController
    AddCustomerController handles adding a new customer in the AddCustomer view.
    AppointmentMainController
    The appointmentMainController handles the main appointment page, including all redirect button clicks and table view population.
    CustomerMainController
    The customerMainController handles the main customer page, including all redirect button clicks and table view population.
    LoginController
    This is the landing page for the application, handles login and logging services.
    MainMenuController
    MainMenuController is the controller responsible for the main menu view
    ModifyAppointmentController
    modify appointment controller handles the modify appointment view for modifying appointments
    ModifyCustomerController
    modify customer controller handles the modify customer view for modifying customers
    ReportController
    This class handles the report view controller and its three table views
